title: Are there rogue Riot Employees who help griefers?
body:
oh, I don't know, I was just asking. 

I mean sure hope not because if anyone ever found out, then someone might get sued.

I mean, all I'm saying is that I've seen some interesting occurrences though a series of tests which indicated that either Riot's buggy crappy code is exploitable or that Riot employees might be helping folks grief others... just sayin.


...if anyone should have experienced such issues, I suggest going directly to the FBI cybercrime division, and not try to handle it through Riot.
